TopicTitle: [GER] Kerbal Space Program Career with CoopY.tv

Articles.Content:
Heya KSP-Folks,

I'm currently streaming a KSP Career with a mission per stream.

We are a serious professional german stream-team and gaming community called CoopY.tv(wich is also our domain) consisting of two male and one female streamers. We have just achieved official partner status on twitch with over 3200 followers.

The stream is mainly in german but if you got questions and tipps, you can ask it in english and we're try to answer it in english (with poor school-english ).

The focus is on entertainment and fun but we're always open to small tipps in building our rag-rockets .

Stream Schedule KSP:

Monday, Wednesday and Friday at 6pm (GMT+2) - CoopY (Entertainment/Fun/Career)

Tuesday and Thursday at 6pm (GMT+2) - iZen (A more professional attempt)

Our Modlist here: http://bit.ly/ctvKSPmods

Come and say hello .

Stream: http://twitch.tv/coopmine

LIVE-Banner:

Kind regards

CoopY

Edited July 4, 2014 by coopmine

NOW LIVE - tune in and say hello

Mission: Icarus!
